channel.title: Project: KillSwitchScape *Hiring*
channel.description:
Welcome to the KillSwitchScape Recruitment Page.
[img]http://i215.photobucket.com/albums/cc108/KillSwitchScape/fan_kse.jpg[/img]
I'm hiring people for certain jobs to help build another successfull Private Server Strand. The following Jobs are available: [code] 1. Coder 2. Server Tester 3. Forum Moderator 4. Hoster 5. Forum Community Manager [/code]
Those are the jobs available. The requirements for these jobs are: [code] Coder- Good at coding servers, has worked with private servers for a while and can do the job good and at a good pace.(5+) Server Tester- Good at testing out the server. Will tell the owner (Me) whats wrong with the server, and what needs to be added/worked on. (3) Forum Moderator- Has to follow all rules of the forums, keeps the forums on track. Has to be on daily. (6) Hoster- Has to have Broadband internet, and will have the server up 24/7 unless there's a problem with the server. (only 1) Forum Community Manager- Has to be on daily, keeps the forum going, posts frequently, helps other players with problems. (Only 1) [/code]
This server will be very customized, and will have many cool features. These are a preview of what it may have: [code] 1. Barrows Minigame 2. Full Pest Control 3. Working Castle Wars Pking 4. Harder to get items/money 5. Webclient on forums page 6. Silabsoft's items 7. All new spawn point 8. Good clan system 9. Harder Jad/King Black Drag. 10. Harder training 11. Fully working skills 12. Good shops with actual RS prices [/code]
If you're intereced in joining KillSwitchScape please post your application. This is the application: [code] XxAPPLICATIONxX 1. Job: 2. Exp: 3. How often are you on daily: 4. Msn (For contact): 5. Misc. (for odd jobs/Hoster): [/code]
Thanks for looking at the KillSwitchScape Recruitment Page. :D (If i'm busy or offline, P_K_E_D will Accept/Decline Applications) Thanks, -=KillSwitchScape=-

item.title: Project: KillSwitchScape *Hiring*
item.dc:creator: @KillSwitchScape KillSwitchScape
item.description:
@KillSwitchScape wrote:

Welcome to the KillSwitchScape Recruitment Page.

I’m hiring people for certain jobs to help build another successfull Private Server Strand.
The following Jobs are available:

1. Coder
2. Server Tester
3. Forum Moderator
4. Hoster
5. Forum Community Manager

Those are the jobs available.
The requirements for these jobs are:

Coder- Good at coding servers, has worked with private servers for a while and can do the job good and at a good pace.(5+)
Server Tester- Good at testing out the server. Will tell the owner (Me) whats wrong with the server, and what needs to be added/worked on. (3)
Forum Moderator- Has to follow all rules of the forums, keeps the forums on track. Has to be on daily. (6)
Hoster- Has to have Broadband internet, and will have the server up 24/7 unless there's a problem with the server. (only 1)
Forum Community Manager- Has to be on daily, keeps the forum going, posts frequently, helps other players with problems. (Only 1)

This server will be very customized, and will have many cool features.
These are a preview of what it may have:

1. Barrows Minigame
2. Full Pest Control
3. Working Castle Wars Pking
4. Harder to get items/money
5. Webclient on forums page
6. Silabsoft's items
7. All new spawn point
8. Good clan system
9. Harder Jad/King Black Drag.
10. Harder training
11. Fully working skills
12. Good shops with actual RS prices

If you’re intereced in joining KillSwitchScape please post your application.
This is the application:

XxAPPLICATIONxX
1. Job:
2. Exp:
3. How often are you on daily:
4. Msn (For contact):
5. Misc. (for odd jobs/Hoster):

Thanks for looking at the KillSwitchScape Recruitment Page.
(If i’m busy or offline, P_K_E_D will Accept/Decline Applications)
Thanks,
-=KillSwitchScape=-
